means: <法>处世机警，随机应变之道，能力才干

sentence.Network_en: He was full of jocularity and savoir-faire.

sentence.Network_cn: 他在外交界以灵活应变而闻名遐迩.

sentence.Network_en: You need both Capital and savoir - faire to a successful entrepreneur.

entry.def: Savoir-faire is the confidence and ability to do the appropriate thing in a social situation.
